name: 詹姆斯·麦迪逊
bio: 美国第4任总统，被誉为'宪法之父'。身材矮小、性格内向，却是制宪会议上最出色的理论家。他与汉密尔顿、杰伊合写《联邦党人文集》，为宪法赢得支持；推动通过《权利法案》，保障公民自由。任总统期间领导了1812年战争，白宫被英军焚毁。
bio_en: Fourth President of the United States and primary architect of the Constitution and the Bill of Rights. Co-authored The Federalist Papers with Hamilton and Jay. As President, he led the nation through the War of 1812. His political partnership with Jefferson shaped the Democratic-Republican Party.

personalEvents.title: 主导制宪会议
personalEvents.description: 提出'弗吉尼亚方案'，成为制宪会议核心设计者
personalEvents.description_en: Proposed the Virginia Plan and became the chief architect of the Constitutional Convention

personalEvents.title: 《联邦党人文集》
personalEvents.description: 与汉密尔顿合写85篇文章，说服各州批准宪法
personalEvents.description_en: Co-wrote 85 essays with Hamilton to persuade states to ratify the Constitution

personalEvents.title: 推动《权利法案》
personalEvents.description: 主导起草并推动通过宪法前十条修正案
personalEvents.description_en: Led the drafting and passage of the first ten amendments to the Constitution

personalEvents.title: 就任总统
personalEvents.description: 当选第4任总统，面对与英国日益紧张的关系
personalEvents.description_en: Elected as the 4th President, facing escalating tensions with Britain

personalEvents.title: 白宫被焚
personalEvents.description: 1812年战争中英军攻入华盛顿，火烧白宫
personalEvents.description_en: British forces invaded Washington during the War of 1812 and burned the White House
